title: Clash Royale | Q&A with yarn | Clash Royale Invitational - Team Global vs Korea - yarn vs Angel

json.text: Mmm it's a Orange Juice
What's up everyone, I'm yarn from Orange juice
My real name is Ryan
Nah I'm kidding, it's Jimmy
I'm doing a Q&A today
After the Q&A I'll be featuring my game play in the Korean tournament
Where I was in Nick's and Pat's team
Will you ever do a face reveal
I did a face reveal last month on twitter but everyone thought I was Jiro
Is Notryan yarn?
No!
How old are you?
I'm the same age as nick
Where do you live?
I live in Canada
Are you Korean-American?
I'm Chinese-Canadian
Why aren't you top?
Gems are Expensive
How do you know all these facts?
I get all the data from Wiki
A lot of it is playing the game and watching replays
Forums on reddit have amazing content too
Do you ever lose
Every day
Are you and Jiro a couple?
She's my special orange
Why isn't Jiro doing any of these videos anymore
She helps me produce videos
Catch her on twitch next month
When did you start playing clash royale
In January
How frequently do you play the game per day
Enough to get crown chests in both of my accounts
Do you spend any money on the game?
The day before the tournament in Korea, I had level 6 hogs
So I open 20 giant chests in my main account
Ever since then, I've been buying legendaries in the shop
So I can keep up to date with the latest legendary for the channel
Yarn, what happened in the super magical cup?
How did you lose in the first round
I sucked!
Are you guys just youtubers, or do you work for supercell
We're just youtubers
How did you choose the name Orange Juice?
A lot of you guys ask this question
I don't have a cool answer for that
I like simple names and I like oranges
Are you the same producer of mixtures's songs?
No, he's a personal friend and a local DJ
How do you feel about the fact that you've grown this much basically over night
It feels unreal
Jiro thinks that we're still at 100 subscribers
Did you think you would have this many subscribers?
Never
What recording and editing softwares do you use for these videos?
I get asked this question a lot
I want to stress that the content you make is more important than the software you're using
But to answer your question
Audacity
Photoshop, premiere, illustrator and after effects
Hi yarn, how much time does it take to make a single video
To make a video, I start writing a script
Record all the footage, record all the audio
And finally create the graphics and animation
The entire process takes me about 3 days, which is about 30 hours
What's your favourite game beside clash royale
Zelda
Are you ever going to play anything else other than clash royale
I would love to once I have enough time
Do you play clash of clans?
If so, can we know what clan you're in and your town hall level?
I do! I have 2 townhall 11 in reddit ares
Any tips on how to grow you channel fast on youtube like your channel has?
Wicked compile a video on all the big youtubers giving tips
Check out the description for the link
Have you ever met molt, pat or nick?
I've met Nick and Pat. I'll love to meet Molt though
What other youtubers do you watch?
Sometimes I watch Casey Neistat
What made you want to start youtube?
I wanted to start a youtube channel where I can deliver concise information.
Hey yarn, do you make Youtube videos for a living, or do you also work
I recently quit my job and dived into youtube full time
What's your instagram
My personal instagram is yyarn
How do we join your clan and will there be a patreon page?
Just apply, if the spot isn't reserved, we'll accept you
We do have a patreon page, it's kind of like a kick starter but with a monthly pledge
Jiro doesn't like being my sugar mama
How's the hair donation
I'm ready to donate my hair soon
I plan to do a fundraiser
Do you love me?
I love all my oranges
Nah delete that!
Who's your favourite clan member and why is it panda?
My favourite clan member is panda because he's really mature for his age
Also for inventing the panda deck! That's sick
That's all for the questions for today
Jiro is doing a face reveal for our 200k subscriber special
Post your questions about what you want to know about her
So I went to compete along side Nick and Pat for the clash royale invitation tournament
First team to win 2 sets, wins the tournament
Each player is matched against someone else on the other team
It was 1vs1
Of those matches, it's best of 7
All cards are allowed
The winner has to keep the same deck.
If you lose you have the choice to change your deck
Lets dive straight into round 1
Right off the bat, I started with a pig push to surprise angel
It looks like it pays off because he couldn't react with his cannon fast enough
The hog dealt over 1000 damage to the tower, 15 seconds into the game
Spear goblins alone can deal over 300 damage to the tower
So I took them out with skeletons for a positive elixir trade
I didn't have anything to deal with the miner
But I knew left a lone he would have done over 400 damage
So I use my fire spirits
I over committed with my minions
But it pays off because it chips his tower
Angel plants an elixir collector
So I decide to rush him with a pig push to prevent him from accumlating
10 elixir for a huge push
the pig push enables my hog to bypass his reactive cannon plant
I have a skeleton in my hand
So I'm not worried because I know they can take 2 shots from an ice wizard
I don't want him pushing one side too hard
So I sent in my Royal Giant to the right to force
angel to use his card in the other lane
I missed my skeleton surround on the Ice wizard
But the skeletons were still able to take care of him
1 fire spirit lands a hit on the tower
While the P.E.K.K.A strikes my tower twice
At this point, I know I can afford those hits
I plant my spear goblins in hopes of chipping off the tower
But it looks like he already has an Ice Wizard and Cannon deployed
I sent in my cannon to take care of the Ice Wizard
Because he can do over 300 damage if ignored
That's the beauty of legendaries
They're mostly even elixir trades
I noticed a pattern with Angel
He likes to plant the Miner in the outside centre tile
So I planted my Skeletons to where he usually deploys them
His Miner didn't even touch my tower
While we're low on elixir
I PigPushed with Fire Spirits
I send in a zap and that's value
I killed his Spear Goblins and stunned everything else
Letting my Hog get 1 hit in
At this point I can't afford letting his Mini PEKKA reach my tower
So I spaced my Spear Goblins away from the tower in case he was planning to zap my arena tower
With the Elixir Pump still on the map, I continue applying pressure with my Royal Giant
Angel didn't react with a Cannon fast enough and had to waste a zap
He over committed on the left side
So I Pig Pushed with Skeletons on the right side
Angel planted Spear Goblins to chip away at my Hog
But that does nothing when I'm armed with a zap. It also stunned his tower allowing my Hog to finish it off
I don't have much to defend against double Ice Wizard and Mini P.E.K.K.A
I know i'm going to lose the tower
The best I can do is send in Minions and Skeletons to chip away at them
So that my kings tower doesn't have much trouble finishing them off
With 20 seconds left on the clock, I'm going to trade my tower for his
He used his fireball for the first time after 2 minutes
And over kills my arena tower
But at this point it doesn't matter with 15 seconds left on the clock
There's not much he could have done
And that's game for round 1
Now lets get into round 2
Same as before, I noticed angel and his team mates really enjoys pumping up
So my strategy for this tournament is to rush them at every moment I can
I sent in spear goblins to deal chip damage
That's more damage than 1 hog strike
It also cycles my deck
Now I have skeletons to plant on top of these archers
With his pump freshly planted
I plant my Royal Giant to take care of it
I ended up denying 5 elixir from pumping
And I managed to draw out his Barbarians
Lucky for me
He missed his zap
Keep in mind, this is May 18th
And the Fire Spirits literally got a buff an hour ago
This is probably his 2nd game ever seeing fire spirits being used in a real match
The Fire Spirits didn't clip all the Barbarians
So I needed to clean up with my minions
With my Minions lingering and his Barbarians out of rotation
I sent in my hog to tank for my minions
Angel deploys minions to counter my push
But I zap his minions and 1 minion survive with a sliver of health
With the hog it almost dealt 1000 damage
Since the losing side has the option to change their decks
I wasn't sure if he had Mini P.E.K.K.A or not
So I circle my Royal Giant with skeletons just in case
Looks like he doesn't have a Mini P.E.K.K.A
But that's okay because I send my fire spirits to make the barbarians more manageable
First the first time in the match
We're both saving elixir, waiting for the next move
So I send in my minions and royal giant on the left side
Angel reflects the actions and deploys royal giant  to tank for the archers on the right side
I plant a reactive cannon to tank
And skeletons to chip away
With the royal giant, those archers could be trouble
So I sent in my fire spirits to deal with the archers
While he sent in his barbarians to my royal giant
It's a good trade because I dealt more damage
I managed to pull the barbarians with spear goblins
And I decide to pull the last barbarian with my royal giant
He answers with minions and archers
I zap to stun so that my royal giant can get 1 extra hit in
And so my arena tower can chip away at them
Angel overreacted with a late cannon
So I punished him with a pig push in the other lane
He missed planted his barbarian block
And over compensate with a zap
My hog still manages to get 1 hit in
I need to clean up the barbarians so I planted my minions
That's the beauty with this deck
Barbarians and mini p.e.k.k.a can be counter with minions
For a positive elixir trade
He was a bit too early on his cannon plant
So I take advantage of that and pig push on the left side
I couldn't cycle my zap fast enough to zap the tower and minions
I send my royal giant because I know his cannon is out of rotation
He cycles his cannon but it's too late
And that's a victory for round 2
Jumping into round 3
Angel has a new deck and I'm not sure
But i know he's not use to this kind of aggression
So I send in my Royal Giant for some easy hits on the tower
He counters with the barbarians
Which is exactly what I want because minions can easily take care of them
He plants a royal giant so I plant a reactive cannon and skeletons for the damage
I immediately pig push to the left
And it looks like the hog is going for the cannon
But then swerves for the tower
His mini p.e.k.k.a may have affected the hog's pathing
With everything clumped together
I zap all 3 units to stun
This allows my hog 1 more hit
1 minute has pass and he only played 5 different cards
I don't know 3 of his cards so I pull his mini p.e.k.k.a in case he has a freeze or miner
I quickly rush in with the royal giant and surround him with skeletons for a cheap shield
Angel responds with minions
So I counter with fire spirits
And they end up taking out the barbarians too!
That's value for 2 elixir
1 of the best cards in the game if used correctly
With the flow of everything
I know I just have to keep applying pressure to slowly chip him away
Because he has the answer to my hog or royal giant
But not both
He sends in a cannon and mini p.e.k.k.a
Which tells me he only has barbarians in rotation to address my royal giant
I quickly take care of the mini p.e.k.k.a and plant my royal giant as soon as i can afford it
Desperate to stay alive angel defends with an elixir pump
I send my hog and he successfully defends with another cannon and mini p.e.k.k.a
I pull his mini p.e.k.k.a to the centre
And cycle back to my royal giant
Since he has a higher cost deck
It was easier for me to keep track of his card rotation
I knew he didn't have zap so I send in fire spirits as back up
And it pays off when he plants barbarians
Confident my royal giant can take out the left side
I pig push on the right side and cycle my royal giant for a massive push
A few more seconds and this match would have been a hat trick
With 3 wins, I only need 1 more to secure my victory since it's best out of 7
Jumping into my fourth match
I continue my aggressive playstyle
And rush in with the royale giant
Angel does the exact same thing
But this is my first time seeing him use skeletons AND fire spirits
I immediately knew he copied my deck
It's now a race of who can remain the most offensive
He over committed on the right side so I ended up doing more damage on the left side
I planted the royal giant to open up the other lane
Angel correctly responds by ignoring my royal giant and rushing the other side
I zapped his minions and hog
This is the single biggest mistake in an entire tournament I've done
As I should've planted the cannon to pull the hog then zap.
With this knowledge he takes advantage of the open lane and plants a royal giant
The strength of this deck is to open up a lane as soon as possible so you can keep cycling royal giant to the center
There's a 700 health difference in our towers
And I know he has to make a huge mistake for me to win
He proactively plants a cannon which means my royal giant can't be planted in the center
That was a really good move on Angel's part
I sent in my royal giant to take care of it from a distance
He surrounds my royal giant with skeletons dealing massive damage to it in the long run
While pressuring my side with the hog it forces me to play my cannon
All while his skeletons, minions and spear goblins chipped away at my royal giant
My minions were out numbered
I had to zap his units or else angel would have been able to support them with a tank
My cannon's now out of rotation
Which allowed angel to plant a royal giant to openly attack my tower
At this point there's not much I can do
I planted my cannon on top of the royal giant's hit box to push him out of range of the arena tower
By now he already cycled back to his royal giant and I'm down another cannon
With 30 seconds left on the clock I have to ignore his royal giant and aggressively attack the other side if I have any hopes of winning
He has two cannons in the map and support troops
Combined it all demolishes my hog and giant
But my royal giant does manage to get some chip damage
I quickly plant a hog to tank for my small units
But angel's fire spirits crushed my dreams
His zap stuned on my hogs single handedly saved his arena tower
And that is game
Angel played my deck really well
The score is now 3 - 1
I need to defeat him 1 more time to win
Before we head into game 5
Lets take a look at what I could have done differently
Right here I zap first
So I didn't have enough to plant the cannon
When the cannon should have been first
If you rewind, you'll notice angel planted the hog on the outer tile
In this situation, it's entirely possible to pull the hog into the other lane
Now lets hop into the 5th match
Since angel, he has to keep the same deck
I use this knowledge to my advantage
And swap out my hog for mini p.e.k.k.a
This deals with his royal giant and hog
I start off the match by rushing the royal giant
He mirrors me and rushes the other side
Angel proactively plants fire spirits to counter all the small units
It's a lot of burst damage to my tower
So I use the mini p.e.k.k.a to absorb the fire spirit as well as take out the giant
I sent in spear goblins to support the mini p.e.k.k.a
He swings for the cannon and he dies
Angel didn't need to zap my spear goblins
Doing so gives me an elixir advantage
With this advantage, I cycle my royal giant
Angel responds with rear spear goblins
So I zap the goblin and stunt he tower
Unfortunately for angel, he planted the minions too early
Getting clipped by my zap, his fire spirits clean up my swarm
So I send in spear goblins
But he immediately zaps them
With his tower down, I have the royal giant advantage
With his cycle deck, it doesn't have many defensive options
Which means you have to be aggressive
And force you opponent to spend elixir on defences
Otherwise they'll accumulate elixir for a strong push that's impossible to defend with small units
With Angel planting the royal giant in the back
I know he's down 6 elixir
So I start applying pressure with my royal giant
Like I was saying with my aggressive offence
He had no elixir to back up his royal giant
And I was able to defend with a cannon and some small units
Which allowed me to cycle back to my royal giant
That one spear goblin is MVP, it threw 6 spears
I prematurely send in my mini p.e.k.k.a to tank for the spear goblins
I was too eager to take out his tower
He sends in a hog to rush
But I have the cannon to pull the hog
I planted a reactive cannon, but it was 1 tile too far to pull the hog
It's nearly impossible to stop the royal giant chip damage
And that's what this deck is about
Pressure your opponent so that they're never sitting at 10 elixir with strong combos
And keep applying chip damage
You send in a royal giant,  they counter with minions, barbarians or mini p.e.k.k.a
And you can counter that with fire spirits or minions
That's it for my matches
If you want to check out nick's and pat's matches, links are in the description below.
They're all subtitle in English
Thanks for watching, be sure to like and subscribe for more quality OJ
Are you a female?
That depends
So many questions...
